product_name: Mountain Hardwear Super Power Tights - Men's
long_description: The Mountain Hardwear Super Power tights for men are designed to maximize comfort during cold-weather runs. Moisture-wicking brushed fabric offers excellent performance, high breathability and a soft fee against skin. Wide, low-profile waist features an internal drawcord to adjust the fit. You'll run farther without chafing thanks to the flatlock seams. Inseam gusset enhances freedom of motion, and zippered back pocket stores extras. The Mountain Hardwear Super Power tights offer a next-to-skin fit.
short_description: The Mountain Hardwear Super Power tights for men are designed to maximize comfort during cold-weather runs.
